text: Richard Laird (July 4, 1939 â€“ December 14, 2020) was an American Democratic politician. He was a member of the Alabama House of Representatives from 1978 to 2014. He was born in Rome, Georgia. Laird died of COVID-19 on December 14, 2020, in Carrollton, Georgia at age 81. ==References== Category:1939 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Georgia (U.S. state) Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Georgia (U.S. state) Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:People from Rome, Georgia
title: Richard Laird
